Html:
I am able to repro this one in 14 and 14.1:

1) start Rawr
2) left-click pants slot to load gemmed pants (Heavy Clefthoof Leggings, Tameless Breeches, etc) into pants slot
3) right-click pants to open Item Editor
4) OK to exit menu; no changes.
5) right-click pants to open Item Editor
6) menu comes up, but "Cannot access a disposed object.  Object name: 'Item Button'"

This is 100% repro on my system.  History: I installed 14 about 3 days before the 14.1 release, then installed 14.1 and am now using that.  Hope this helps, feel free to ask for more info if there is anything else I can do.
For you it happens on the *right-click* of the item button, not the left-click?

True, I can also get a similar crash by following the steps 1-4 and then:

5) left-click pants to select different pants
6) no pants selection menu comes up; crash with "Cannot access a disposed object..."

BTW, I haven't been able to get non-gemmed pants to crash in either of these ways.  I am suspicious of the gem windows.

If there's already a thread on this with steps taken and things to look for, point me at it and I'll do some more testing.
